keyPolicies.policyTitle: EVERY CHILD IN WALTHAMSTOW DESERVES A GOOD EDUCATION.
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will support parents and schools so every child can realise their potential. Investing more in school as promised by the next Conservative government is a promise I will ensure works for our children. I will support a Youth council.

Everyone living in Walthamstow should feel safe when out in our streets. I will work with local groups and young people to fight for our fair share of the promised extra Police officers under the next Conservative government.

I am a Registered Nurse with strong belief in advocating for my patients. Am committed to ensuring that our NHS continues to meet the needs of everyone by working with the next Conservative government to deliver world class care.

issues.education: Investing more in school as promised by the next Conservative government is a promise I will ensure works for our children.
issues.health: I am a Registered Nurse with strong belief in advocating for my patients. Am committed to ensuring that our NHS continues to meet the needs of everyone by working with the next Conservative government to deliver world class care.

images.caption: Shade Adoh with a backdrop of the Walthamstow area.
